byline.contributor: David E. Sanger contributed reporting from Lausanne, Switzerland.

abstract: Pres Obama signs executive order authorizing financial and travel sanctions against anyone involved in online attacks originating or directed from outside country; order is part of efforts by government to keep abreast of fast-changing technology used in potential national security threats.
lead_paragraph: President Obama signed an executive order that would impose financial and travel sanctions against foreign-based hackers targeting the United States.

headline.main: Obama Expands Options for Retaliating Against Foreign Hackers
headline.print_headline: Obama Expands Options for Retaliating Against Foreign Hackers Who Target U.S.

snippet: President Obama signed an executive order that would impose financial and travel sanctions against foreign-based hackers targeting the United States.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
